es.um.redes.P2P.App

Interface PeerControllerIface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PeerController

    public interface PeerControllerIface

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Message createMessageFromCurrentCommand()
      Creates the appropriate type of request message depending on the current command.
      void downloadFileFromSeeds(java.net.InetSocketAddress[] seedList, FileInfo targetFileHash)
      Download file from the list of seeds provided, by creating a downloader object for this target file identified by its hash.
      void getConfigFromTracker()
      Sets COM_CONFIG as current command and process it, in order to obtain the configuration (chunk size) from the tracker.
      byte getCurrentCommand()
      Gets the current command assigned to this controller.
      void printQueryResult()
      Prints the list of files obtained from last query (previously saved by recordQueryResult) which are available for download
      void processCurrentCommand()
      Process the current command with its arguments, if any.
      void processMessageFromTracker(Message response)
      Process response messages from tracker, performing the appropriate actions according to the type of the message.
      void publishSharedFilesToTracker()
      Sets COM_ADDSEED as current command and process it, in order to send all shared files to the tracker.
      void recordQueryResult(FileInfo[] fileList)
      Save the list of files sent by the tracker in response to a query request, excluding those files that are already shared by this peer.
      void setCurrentCommand(byte command)
      Sets the current command to be processed by this controller.
      void setCurrentCommandArguments(java.lang.String[] args)
      Sets the current command's arguments, as returned by the shell.

    • Method Detail

      • createMessageFromCurrentCommand

        Message createMessageFromCurrentCommand()
        Creates the appropriate type of request message depending on the current command.
        Returns:
        The request message created, null for commands that don't need communication with tracker

      • downloadFileFromSeeds

        void downloadFileFromSeeds(java.net.InetSocketAddress[] seedList,
                           FileInfo targetFileHash)
        Download file from the list of seeds provided, by creating a downloader object for this target file identified by its hash.
        Parameters:
        inetSocketAddresses - The list of peers that currently share the file.
        targetFileHash - The target file to download

      • getConfigFromTracker

        void getConfigFromTracker()
        Sets COM_CONFIG as current command and process it, in order to obtain the configuration (chunk size) from the tracker.

      • getCurrentCommand

        byte getCurrentCommand()
        Gets the current command assigned to this controller.
        Returns:
        The current command assigned to this controller

      • printQueryResult

        void printQueryResult()
        Prints the list of files obtained from last query (previously saved by recordQueryResult) which are available for download

      • processCurrentCommand

        void processCurrentCommand()
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Process the current command with its arguments, if any. Note that setCurrentCommand and setCurrentCommandArguments must have been called before the command can be processed. This method must create the appropriate message, send it to the tracker, receive the corresponding response(s), and process the response to perform any actions required to complete the command.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • processMessageFromTracker

        void processMessageFromTracker(Message response)
        Process response messages from tracker, performing the appropriate actions according to the type of the message.
        Parameters:
        response - The response message to be processed

      • publishSharedFilesToTracker

        void publishSharedFilesToTracker()
        Sets COM_ADDSEED as current command and process it, in order to send all shared files to the tracker.

      • recordQueryResult

        void recordQueryResult(FileInfo[] fileList)
        Save the list of files sent by the tracker in response to a query request, excluding those files that are already shared by this peer. The result of each query is used for selecting the file to download.
        Parameters:
        fileList - The full list of files returned by the tracker

      • setCurrentCommand

        void setCurrentCommand(byte command)
        Sets the current command to be processed by this controller.

      • setCurrentCommandArguments

        void setCurrentCommandArguments(java.lang.String[] args)
        Sets the current command's arguments, as returned by the shell.
        Parameters:
        args - The validated arguments given by the user.
